exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing U, V : NormedModule K f, g : U -> V x : U l : U -> V Hloc : locally x (fun y : U => f y = g y) Hlin : is_linear l z : U Hd : forall eps : posreal, locally x (fun x : U => norm (minus (minus (f x) (f z)) (l (minus x z))) <= eps * norm (minus x z)) Fz : is_filter_lim (locally x) z Unable to unify "exists eps : posreal, forall y : U, ball x eps y -> (fun x : U => norm (minus (minus (f x) (f z)) (l (minus x z))) <= ?M2372 * norm (minus x z)) y" with "forall eps : posreal, locally x (fun x : U => norm ((fun y : U => minus (minus (g y) (g z)) (l (minus y z))) x) <= eps * norm ((fun y : U => minus y z) x))".

original: intros Hloc Hf. destruct Hf as [Hlin Hd]. split. - apply Hlin. - intros z Fz. specialize (Hd z Fz). unfold is_domin in Hd. intros P HP. apply Hd. intros y Hy. apply HP. exists (norm (minus y z)). apply Hy.
